#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    double srt,result;
    long long int r,x,y,xo,yo,v,temp,temp0;
    long long int temp1,temp2,temp3;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld",&r,&x,&y,&xo,&yo,&v);
        temp=x-xo;
        temp0=y-yo;
        temp1=temp*temp;
        temp2=temp0*temp0;
        temp3=temp1+temp2;
        if(temp3>=(r*r))
            printf("%f\n",0.000000);
        else
        {
        srt=sqrt(temp3);
        srt=r-srt;
        result=srt/v;
        printf("%lf\n",result);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
